name: Hobgoblin
description: Hobgoblins are militaristic and fecund, a combination that makes them a threat to all who stand in their way. They are larger, stronger, and more disciplined than their goblin cousins.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Martial Training
traits.description: You are proficient with two martial weapons of your choice and with light armor.

traits.name: Saving Face
traits.description: If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5).
